file_content.text: It has been an honor to serve with you.
I received word from Broga.
You kept our operations safe and eliminated the Empire's masterminds.
Major Treeg's death, unfortunate as it may be, brings justice to all the good men he betrayed.
I've sent a squad to take Major Treeg into custody. He will answer for what he's done.
The Republic Army owes you a debt of gratitude.
It's been an honor to serve with you, General.
It was my pleasure to serve.
I assure you, the honor has been all mine.
This was almost fun.
I am more grateful than I can express.
Will the Empire withdraw? Does everything go back to normal now?
Is the war here over?
Not quite.
It will take time to find and stamp out the remaining Imperial forces.
As long as we remain here, you will be honored and welcomed.
This area is no longer secure. I'll await your safe return at our base. Good luck.
I wish you luck out there.
Welcome! Please come in, everyone. We were just discussing strategy.
Master Jedi, members of your order are always welcome. Please, join us.
Captain, the reputation of your squad has preceded you. You are most welcome here. Please, come in. At ease.
Welcome. Republic Command informed me that your ship was in the sector. I had hoped you might be joining us.
I've been expecting you. Republic Command has spoken very highly of your abilities.
I'm General Korvan, at your service. This is Major Treeg, my right hand.
General, don't change the subject! If we don't strike now, the Empire will drive us completely off the planet!
You know we cannot be drawn into attacking the enemy, Major. The mines and factories would be left undefended.
It's a risk we must take! Surely you agree with me? We can't let the Empire simply advance to our doorstep!
I need more information before I can make a judgment.
Could you elaborate?
I commend your caution. We are not at liberty to impulsively wager our people's lives.
There's no need to pull men from the defenses, General. Havoc Squad could easily make an assault on the enemy.
I could engage them.
Captain, your arrival here may be instrumental in our victory on this planet.
I won't get suckered into an argument. You settle this yourselves.
Don't drag me into your feud.
You're right.
You see, General? They agree! Order the attack!
Listen to the Jedi, General. We can't win this war without taking the offensive, and quickly.
Our own Special Forces recommends this, General. We must strike now.
Now will you hear me, General? Even a common spacer sees the need for action.
You hear that, General? I'm not the only one who sees our inaction leading to disaster!
I thank you for the recommendation, but this matter is not up for a vote.
That seems rash.
I will not leave our civilian workers undefended in order to press an attack. And that is final, Major.
General? I'm getting a distress call from the worker camps. Putting it through now, sir.
Is anyone there? General Korvan, you have to help us! Imperial sappers have blown open the venom pipelines.
There's venom flooding everywhere, poisoning my men--we can't get past the Imperials to seal the pipes.
Do what you can to get your people out. Help is on the way. Korvan out.
How far away is that camp? Are there troops stationed in the area?
Where was that call from?
The camp isn't far, but most of our men are stationed at the mines.
Let me handle this.
Thank you. I confess, I was hoping to enlist your aid.
If you had engaged the Empire, they wouldn't be attacking civilians now.
Should have attacked.
My thoughts exactly.
Major, you are too talented an officer to end your career on insubordination charges. Do I make myself clear?
Yes, sir. My apologies. Should I redeploy my men to the worker camps?
I'd like you to hold your forces at the mines in case this is simply a tactic to draw us out.
If you're willing to help us, please, go to the camp. Drive back the Imperials and seal the pipeline.
Won't those workers need medical attention?
What about the poisoned men?
They will.
Of course I'll help, General.
Take these healing adrenals. They'll counteract the venom. Speak to the foreman once the site is secure. And good luck.
This isn't really my area of expertise.
I can't. [Refuse quest]
We need every man and woman on this planet if we are to get through this. I hope you'll reconsider.
I'm afraid I'm in the middle of a meeting now. See me another time.
